parameters.name: DbId
parameters.description:
The database ID. You can call the [ListDatabases](~~141873~~) operation to query the ID of a physical database and the [ListLogicDatabases](~~141874~~) operation to query the ID of a logical database.

>  The value of DatabaseId is that of DbId.

parameters.name: TableName
parameters.description:
The table name.

> You can also call the [ListTables](~~141878~~) operation to query the table name.

parameters.name: TableSchemaName
parameters.description: The schema name of the table, which is required only for SQL Server instances.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The ID of the tenant.

>  To view the ID of the tenant, go to the Data Management (DMS) console and move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner. For more information, see the [View information about the current tenant](~~181330~~) section of the "Manage DMS tenants" topic.
